name: 楊士萱
objective: 本課程在於介紹科學及工程系統中數項常用數學之原理及應用，內容涵蓋微分方程、差分方程。授課內容大綱如下：1.複習線性代數2.一階微分方程式3.線性二階及高階微分方程式4.函數的近似5.差分方程
schedule:
Weeks 1-4: Quick review of Linear Algebra and MATLAB.
Weeks 5-8: Linear Differential Equations.
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Weeks 10-13: Advanced Differential Equations and Laplace Transforms
Weeks 14,15: Approximations of Functions
Weeks 16,17: Difference Equations
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1. Written and MATLAB homeworks, 20%.
2. Two 50-minute Quizzes, 30% (15% each).
3. 100-minute Midterm exam, 25%.
4. 100-minute Final exam, 25%.
materials:
Textbook:
Advanced Engineering Mathematics with MATLAB by T. L. Harman, J. Dabney, and N. Richert, 2nd edition, Brooks/Cole Thomson, 2000. （高立書局代理）

Reference :
Advanced Engineering Mathematics by P. V. O’Neil, Thomson, 2007.
